oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Overton Park Pavilion and Lawn
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “Pavilion, Overton Park, Memphis, Tenn. [Typed/Pre-printed]” Color image “Doesn’t this -- look natural -- and remind you -- of good times? -- EEC -- 7/27/07 -- Am glad you kept your promise. -- YMCA is where I sat alnight when I -- was afraid to go home in the dark -- Hope you have a fine time EEC”
“Miss Irene Brignardello -- P.O. Box 133 -- Paris, -- Texas”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Overton Park; parks; midtown;
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Souvenir Post Card Co., New York
